content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

official Isabelle2012 will be rolled-out next week. Release candidate #3
is now available here:

http://isabelle.in.tum.de/website-Isabelle2012-RC3

The microscopic changes compared to RC1 and RC2 can be seen here
http://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle-release

This is the last chance to report any problems before the official release
of Isabelle2012.

Makarius
